Message:
Allow me to tell you
the legend of
the infamous mononoke!

In the days when humans
still feared the gods,
’twas said a heinous mononoke
caused great commotion
among the people.

A very wise mononoke
she was, indeed.

And above that,
brave and unbeatable!
Truly the mightiest!

Those who heard the rumors
of the mononoke came to
vanquish her nearly every day,

but they were all sent
back home utterly defeated!

was none other than me—
Tama the Glorious!

Heh-heh!
There was not a soul
who could stop me.
The world existed for my sake!
